General.Name: Cube&Company Co. Ltd
General.Description: Exergy21 Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes pharmaceutical raw materials, healthcare products, and cosmetics in South Korea. It primarily provides active pharmaceutical ingredients. The company was formerly known as Hanchang Biotech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Exergy21 Co., Ltd. in October 2022. Exergy21 Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
